short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension, register paper of acmdl and ieee, to scrapbox

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ACM Digital Library，IEEEの論文(https://dl.acm.org/doi/*，https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/*)をワンクリックでscrapboxに登録します．

scrapboxのページタイトルに論文タイトル，本文に学会，著者，概要が自動的に挿入されます．学会，著者はタグ付けされ，簡単にscrapboxで論文のサーベイを行えます．

Register an article (https://dl.acm.org/doi/*, https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/*) from the ACM Digital Library, IEEE in scrapbox with a single click.

The title of the article is automatically inserted into the page title of the scrapbox, and the conference, author, and abstract are automatically inserted into the body of the article. The conference and authors are tagged, making it easy to survey papers in scrapbox.

GitHub
https://github.com/tomoki52/scrap-paper-chrome-extension
